title.rendered: Important Dates For Winter Sports Registration

content.rendered:
The winter sports season will begin on Monday, November 13 for varsity, JV, and freshman teams.  Registration for varsity, JV, and freshman sports will open on Monday, October 16 through FamilyID.

The modified7/8 winter sports begin on Monday, November 20.  Registration for modified sports will open on Monday, October 30 through FamilyID.

Physicals expire 12 months after the date of the health exam. No athlete will be permitted to play or tryout with an expired physical. 

APP Testing Dates: Monday, November 6 and Wednesday, November from 2:20 p.m. – 3:15 p.m. in the Maple Avenue Middle School Gym.

    Tryout information will be shared on this page in November. For specific team information, please contact coaches directly.  Click here for coach contact information.
